meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sallow.
meanings.sent1: Her sallowness was noticeable in the dim light of the room.
meanings.sent2: The doctor noted the patient's sallowness as a sign of illness.
meanings.sent3: Despite her sallowness, she had a radiant smile that lit up the room.
meanings.sent4: The sallowness of the old photograph added a nostalgic touch to the memory.
meanings.sent5: The sallowness of the banana peel indicated it was overripe.
